item.description:
Fuzz Fest on Saturday, Jan. 30
There will be a Fuzz Fest on January 30 at the Exeter Congregational Church from 10 - 2. It will be a gathering of local fiber enthusiasts and vendors- spinning weaving knitting crocheting felting, etc. Riverslea Farm will be there, as well as other local vendors and craftspeople, demonstrating and selling. Check out the details at www.exetercongchurch.org!


Meet at Starbucks at 9:45, then we could carpool or form a convoy over to Exeter.
item.name: Fuzz Fest on Saturday Jan 30
